definitions.definition: A town in the Metropolitan Borough of Wigan , Greater Manchester , England ( OS grid ref SD6204 ) .
A hamlet in Stocksfield parish, Northumberland , England ( OS grid ref NZ0559 ) .
A habitational surname from Old English .

main_definition: A town in the Metropolitan Borough of Wigan , Greater Manchester , England ( OS grid ref SD6204 ) .
secondary_definitions: A hamlet in Stocksfield parish, Northumberland , England ( OS grid ref NZ0559 ) .
A habitational surname from Old English .
